name: cloudflare-agents
description: Comprehensive guide for the Cloudflare Agents SDK - build AI-powered autonomous agents on Workers + Durable Objects. INCLUDES CRITICAL ARCHITECTURAL GUIDANCE: explains when to use Agents SDK vs when to just use AI SDK (simpler), what Agents SDK provides (infrastructure, NOT AI), and how to combine with Vercel AI SDK or Workers AI. Use when: deciding if you need Agents SDK infrastructure, building AI agents with WebSockets + state, creating stateful agents with Durable Objects, implementing chat
